>
[Native Waters](/Feats.aspx?ID=3931) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Undine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=314" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 31</row>

</column>

---

You were born with or obtained a special connection to either fresh water or salt water. Once made, this decision can't be changed. Whenever you take your full rest in a natural body of water of the type corresponding to your connection, you recover additional Hit Points equal to your level, and if you have the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9) or [fatigued](/Conditions.aspx?ID=15) conditions, you reduce them by 2 instead of 1.
